comments.body:
For sale is a BRAND NEW NEVER RIDDEN, 2015 Specialized SHIV PRO RACE, size LARGE. Have had almost a year. Again, bike has never seen the pavement, was built and then hung, upgraded clx 60 wheels are brand new as well. Never even test riden. Bike has custom hyper green sticker, cabling, and top of the line shifter and derailleur cables. I switched out the brake levers to new dura ace levers, and new specialized cable aero braking system. 

*FORK HAS STILL NOT BEEN CUT, PRETTY MUCH BUILT OUT OF BOX FOR PICTURES.

BIKE COMES WITH: *Shiv stack and riser kit, *DECAL FRAME COLOR KIT! 


Asking $3500.00 for bike full dura ace mechanical without wheels ( frame alone is 3k without anything) 
Asking $5000.00 with upgraded wheels (comes with wheel bag) and *additional pair of carbon brake pads. 


Bike alone retails at 6750.00 WITHOUT upgraded CLX wheels. 

Will be more than happy to send additional pictures. 

Please PM me with any questions and will talk shipping with buyer. THANK YOU!
Very interested...Send me a message or email. DanSchapiroATgmail.com
